Name: Triversal
About the game: Triversal is a satisfying puzzle game that offers the perfect balance of chill and challenge. Use spatial logic to suspend a light orb over a black hole by connecting it to stretchy tethers. A Snack for your Brain: A perfect palette cleanser between intense tasks, whether you have a couple minutes or a couple hours to unwind. Pick Up and Play: Triversal is easy to learn and satisfying to master; simply add and remove elastic tethers to pull the light orb so it lines up with the black hole. Play with mouse, keyboard or a controller. Itâ€™s as easy as 1-2-3. A Perfect Balance of Chill and Challenge: Triversal offers a gentle learning curve, thousands of levels and a range of puzzle modes to suit your mood. Puzzle Packs: Thousands of levels to work through at your own pace. Daily Puzzle: Rack up perfect streaks and compete for a high score on a new challenge daily. Endurance: Complete level after level of progressively more difficult puzzles where each move costs a coin. Try to beat your high score before you run out of coins altogether. Sandbox: Customize your level of challenge on the fly as you play through endless puzzles. With unlimited coins, there is no risk, so play how you like. Streamer Assist: Collaborate with your streaming audience with the Streamer Assist feature, an optional overlay that adds numbered labels to your puzzles, allowing viewers to play along in chat by suggesting solutions.
